title: =role

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - =role someone. The host uses =role in their channel, and whatever role comes out is their new role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The host can rule 17 a role.
- You learn what role was =role'd. *You* can rule 17 a role, but only once per game.
- If the role that was =role'd should become a new role (due to promotion or smthn), it becomes that role.
- If a role cannot spawn because of a dependency, the next player you =role will become the dependent role.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive to the end of the game, and =role 3 players.

desc:
Post 4217
*probably the most used bot command ngl*
